original: Levin, Herman, överste. Visborgs-slätt, f. 15/4/94 i Nykil, östergötl. 1., av insp. Oskar L. o. Elin Jacobson. G. 18 m. Ingeborg Amehe Ahrén. Barnr Ingrid f. 19, g. m. diplring. B. Rosander, Västerås, Vera 24. — Studrex. 12, offrex. 14. Undrlöjtn. v. Första livgren rreg. 14, löjtn. 19, v. Livgren r-reg. 28, kapt. 29, major 36, v. Svea livg. 37, övrlöjtn. 40, överste 43. Ka-dettoff. v. KS 26-31, andre lär. v. infr-skjutsk. 31-32, dito v. KS 33-34, kom-p rchef där 34-37, chefsinstr. v. Sthlms landstrförb. 37-39, chef f. infrskjutsk. 43-45, överste o. chef f. Gotl. inf rreg. sed. 45. KS02kl, RVO, KDDO, RB-LeopO, Sthlms landstrförb. GM, Land-st rSM, östergötl. v. landstrförb. SM, Sthlms skytteförb. SM, SvsfbSM, SkytteM, Chr. Xres FrM, LKrVa. *Levin, Josef, tandläkare. Vara, f. 31/10/86 i Hudiksvall av David L. o. Eva Zacharias. G. 20 m, Lily Simon. Barnr Leif f. 22, Sonja 24. — Mogr-ex. v. norra latin i Sthlm 06, tandlr-kand. 10, tandläk. 12. Praktik i Vara sed. 12. Led. av valnd, suppl. i kom-mrnd o. samrealsk rstyr., ordf. i elverksstyr. o. Vara sportklubb. Studr-resa t. Tyskl. 22.
translated:
Levin, Herman, Colonel. Visborgs-slätt, born April 15, 1894 in Nykil, Östergötland. Son of Inspector Oskar L. and Elin Jacobson. Married in 1918 to Ingeborg Amehe Ahrén. Children: Ingrid, born in 1919, married to diplomat B. Rosander, Västerås, and Vera, born in 1924. Completed secondary school in 1912 and joined the army in 1914. Promoted to Second Lieutenant in the First Life Grenadier Regiment in 1914, Lieutenant in 1919, Lieutenant in the Life Grenadier Regiment in 1928, Captain in 1929, Major in 1936, Lieutenant Colonel in 1940, and Colonel in 1943. Served as Cadet Officer at the Royal Swedish Academy from 1926-1931, Second Teacher at the Infantry Shooting School from 1931-1932, same position at the Royal Swedish Academy from 1933-1934, Commander from 1934-1937, Chief Instructor at the Stockholm County Federation from 1937-1939, Chief of the Infantry Shooting School from 1943-1945, and Colonel and Chief of the Gotland Infantry Regiment since 1945. Recipient of the Royal Order of the Sword, Knight of the Royal Order of Vasa, Commander of the Danish Order of the Dannebrog, Knight of the Belgian Order of Leopold, Sports Medal of the Stockholm County Federation, Medal of the Östergötland County Federation, Sports Medal of the Stockholm Shooting Federation, Swedish Shooting Federation's Medal, Christian X's Freedom Medal, and Medal of the Legion of Honour. 

Levin, Josef, Dentist. Vara, born October 31, 1886 in Hudiksvall, son of David L. and Eva Zacharias. Married in 1920 to Lily Simon. Children: Leif, born in 1922, and Sonja, born in 1924. Completed secondary education at Norra Latin in Stockholm in 1906, studied dentistry until 1910, and became a dentist in 1912. Practiced in Vara since 1912. Member of the School Board, substitute in the Municipal Council and Secondary School Board, Chairman of the Power Plant Board and Vara Sports Club. Traveled to Germany in 1922 for study purposes.

children.description: Married to diplomat B. Rosander, Västerås
